titleStmt.title: The tyde taryeth no man A moste pleasant and merry commody, right pythie and full of delight. Compiled by George Wapull. Fovvre persons may easily play it. ...
titleStmt.author: Wapull, George, fl. 1576.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fleetestreate, beneath the Conduite, at the signe of Saynt Iohn Euaungelist, by Hugh Iackson,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A new commody called The tyde taryeth no man.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
